Name: Hot Speed
About the game: In a mysterious underground bar, gathered a group of beautiful face, hot figure of the female drivers. The player takes on the role of one of the drivers and conquers the other drivers with his powerful driving skills. · Players can gain fame and money by challenging other riders. · Players can participate in the time trial and finish the race within the specified time to win, otherwise they will fail. · Players can participate in the regular season, fight for the first place to win, otherwise lose. · Players can refer to the chase match, not to be thrown off the other side to win, or fail. · Players can participate in practice races to hone their racing skills. · Players challenge other riders and have a chance to trigger a story with the drivers.
